gifts.name: Personalized Star Map Necklace
gifts.description: Custom star map showing the night sky from any special date and location

gifts.name: Silk Pillowcase Set
gifts.description: Luxurious mulberry silk pillowcase for hair and skin care

gifts.name: Custom Coordinates Bracelet
gifts.description: Engraved bracelet with coordinates of your special place

testimonials.review_text: Got this for our anniversary with the coordinates of where we first met. She absolutely loved it and wears it every day. The quality is amazing and it's so personal.
My girlfriend is really into astronomy, so I thought this would be perfect. She was so surprised and touched by the thoughtfulness. Definitely helped me score major points!
She's always complaining about her hair being messy in the morning. This completely solved that problem and she says her skin feels softer too. Win-win!
